Potion, Common
This herbal concoction is meant to be gargled and spat out. When you use this potion, you gain advantage for 1 hour on any Charisma (Perform) checks made for singing or speaking. The next bard spell you cast while the potion is in effect has a +1 bonus to its save DC.
